articles.author: Tim Hepher, Shivani Tanna, Mike Stone
articles.title: Boeing to buy Spirit Aero in $4.7 billion deal after months of talks - Reuters.com
articles.description: Boeing agreed to buy back Spirit AeroSystems for $4.7 billion in stock and Airbus moved to take on the supplier's loss-making Europe-focused activities in return for hundreds of millions of dollars of compensation in a rare coordinated move.
